scenariodescription: The robot starts inside a narrow aisle at node 79 in a small warehouse and needs to transport a box to another point in the warehouse. The robot's path will take it through various passageways and intersections. There is a human standing at the opposite end of the aisle at node c5. The human remains in its position until the robot clears the path. Once the robot is no longer blocking the way, the human starts moving towards its goal within the aisle.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 stands at node c5 and waits until the robot is no longer blocking the path in the aisle. Once the robot has moved and is no longer in the way, Human 1 starts moving towards its goal in the aisle.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot moves from node 79 to its intended destination while ensuring it does not block Human 1's path. It will detect the human and say 'EXCUSE ME' to make sure Human 1 is aware of its presence. Once the human moves aside, the robot will proceed to its goal and complete the delivery task.

tree.HUMAN 1:
<root main_tree_to_execute='HumanWaitAndMoveTree'>
    <BehaviorTree ID='HumanWaitAndMoveTree'>
        <Fallback name='InteractWithRobot'>
            <Sequence name='WaitForRobot'>
                <IsRobotBlocking agent_id='{id}' distance='0.5' />
                <RobotSays agent_id='{id}' message='4' />
                <LookAtRobot agent_id='{id}' />
            </Sequence>
            <Sequence name='MoveToGoal'>
                <IsRobotVisible agent_id='{id}' distance='2.0' />
                <TimeExpiredCondition seconds='2' ts='time' only_once='false' />
                <UpdateGoal agent_id='{id}' />
                <RegularNav agent_id='{id}' time_step='{dt}' />
            </Sequence>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

reasoning: The scenario describes a delivery robot that must transport a box starting at node 79 in a narrow aisle. Human 1 waits at node c5, blocking the path. As the robot moves towards its goal, it detects Human 1's presence and will say 'EXCUSE ME' to inform the human of its intent to pass. Human 1, upon hearing the robot's gesture, will wait until the robot is no longer blocking the path and then proceed toward its own goal. The robot ensures not to block the human's path and continues to its intended destination efficiently.
